articles.description: Looking back at a memorable national signing day, from both ends of the perception spectrum
articles.content:
There was a little bit of everything at play Wednesday, the de facto National Signing Day as college football's Early Signing Period kicked off. 
There were two dozen flips, including the No. 1 recr… [+5454 chars]
